comment: /**  * Verifies that the given path eventually appears on / disappears from <tt>fs</tt> within  * <tt>deadline</tt> nanoseconds.  */
code: /**  * Verifies that the given path eventually appears on / disappears from <tt>fs</tt> within  * <tt>deadline</tt> nanoseconds.  */ public static void checkPathEventualExistence(FileSystem fs, Path path, boolean expectedExists, long deadline) throws IOException, InterruptedException {     boolean dirExists.     while ((dirExists = fs.exists(path)) != expectedExists && System.nanoTime() < deadline) {         Thread.sleep(10).     }     assertEquals(expectedExists, dirExists). }
